commits.message:
* ext/syck: removed. Fixes [ruby-core:43360]

* test/syck: removed.

* lib/yaml.rb: only require psych, show a warning if people try to set
  the engine to syck.

git-svn-id: svn+ssh://ci.ruby-lang.org/ruby/trunk@36786 b2dd03c8-39d4-4d8f-98ff-823fe69b080e

* insns.def: search up the cf stack for an object that is an instance
  of the recipient class.  Fixes [ruby-core:47186]

* test/ruby/test_super.rb: related test.

git-svn-id: svn+ssh://ci.ruby-lang.org/ruby/trunk@36784 b2dd03c8-39d4-4d8f-98ff-823fe69b080e

* 2012-08-23

git-svn-id: svn+ssh://ci.ruby-lang.org/ruby/trunk@36785 b2dd03c8-39d4-4d8f-98ff-823fe69b080e

* ext/date/date_core.c: [ruby-core:47266].

comment.body: Thank you, please ignore this travis thing (it doesn'e know how to build 1.8.7).
This pull request [fails](http://travis-ci.org/ruby/ruby/builds/2198851) (merged a097b3ef into e48d99f0).

* vm_insnhelper.c (vm_setup_method): fix last commit.
  [ruby-dev:46065] [Bug #6901]



git-svn-id: svn+ssh://ci.ruby-lang.org/ruby/trunk@36774 b2dd03c8-39d4-4d8f-98ff-823fe69b080e

* vm_trace.c: support TracePoint. [ruby-trunk - Feature #6895]
* test/ruby/test_settracefunc.rb: add tests for above.
* proc.c (rb_binding_new_with_cfp): add an internal function.
* vm.c (rb_vm_control_frame_id_and_class): add an internal function.
* vm_trace.c: add rb_add_event_hook2() and rb_thread_add_event_hook2().
  Give us the good name for them!



git-svn-id: svn+ssh://ci.ruby-lang.org/ruby/trunk@36773 b2dd03c8-39d4-4d8f-98ff-823fe69b080e

  optimization for frames with VM_FRAME_FLAG_FINISH.

comment.body:
From my experience, simplicity is not a primary goal.
Seeking simplicity in language design does not help much, I think.

Because things too simple are difficult.
Because things too complex are difficult too.
Because human thoughts are not simple.
Because programs are essentially complex.
Because combination of simple concepts can be complex very easily.

-- Yukihiro Matsumoto, http://www.rubyist.net/~matz/slides/oscon2003/mgp00047.html
